name: Minori Chihara
description: {{Nihongo|'''Minori Chihara'''|茅原 実里|Chihara Minori|born November 18, 1980}} is a Japanese [[Voice acting in Japan|voice actress]] and singer who has had roles in several [[anime]] series. She is well known for her voice role as [[Yuki Nagato]] in ''[[The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya]]'' and [[List of The Idolmaster characters#961 Production|Leon]] in ''[[The iDOLM@STER]]'',{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} while in her musical career, she has been signed under [[King Records (Japan)|King Records]] and [[Lantis (company)|Lantis]]. She was born in the city of [[Utsunomiya]], [[Tochigi Prefecture|Tochigi]] and was raised in [[Saitama Prefecture|Saitama]]. She was affiliated with the talent agency [[Horipro|HoriPro International]].
